episodes.title: Bethany Joy Lenz Reveals Biggest Takeaway From Decade In Hollywood Cult
episodes.description:
"I wanted to belong so badly." "One Tree Hill" star Bethany Joy Lenz dishes on her new memoir "Dinner for Vampires," where she recounts her decade-long experience in a Hollywood cult. Bethany opens up about how her desire to find community in Los Angeles led her to be taken advantage of, and reveals that her biggest takeaway from the experience is the importance of showing up for people you care about.

0:00 - Bethany Joy Lenz Joins The Show
0:50 - Growing Up Religious
2:00 - Bethany Joy Lenz's Experience In A Hollywood Cult
4:32 - Showing Up For Those You Care About

New Memoir "Dinner For Vampires"
